IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE CITY OF AUSTIN AND THE CAPITAL METRO TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY (CAP METRO) CREATED THE AUSTIN TRANSIT PARTNERSHIP (ATP) IN DECEMBER 2020 AS THE INDEPENDENT ENTITY, AND THE PRINCIPAL ENTITY, ACCOUNTABLE AND RESPONSIBLE FOR THE FINANCING, DESIGN, CONSTRUCTION, AND OVERALL IMPLEMENTATION OF PROJECT CONNECT. ATP'S CHARGE IS TO DELIVER ON THE VOTERS' TRANSIT VISION IN PARTNERSHIP WITH THE COMMUNITY - AND IN A WAY THAT EMBEDS EQUITY, SUSTAINABILITY, AND TRANSPARENCY AS OVERARCHING PRIORITIES. ATP IS DRIVEN BY DATA, WHICH INCLUDES COMMUNITY INPUT, AND IS COMMITTED TO MEETING THE VOTERS' GOALS AND HONORING AUSTIN'S VALUES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: ATP'S MISSION IS TO DELIVER ON THE VOTERS' TRANSIT VISION IN PARTNERSHIP WITH THE COMMUNITY - AND IN A WAY THAT EMBEDS EQUITY, SUSTAINABILITY, AND TRANSPARENCY AS OVERARCHING PRIORITIES.
IRS990.Desc: PROJECT CONNECT IS A TRANSFORMATIVE, VOTER-APPROVED INVESTMENT IN NEW TRANSIT SERVICES THAT INCLUDES LIGHT RAIL, METRORAPID BUS LINES, COMMUTER RAIL (IMPROVEMENTS TO EXISTING LINE AND A NEW LINE), AND PARK AND RIDE FACILITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ANTI DISPLACEMENT-PROJECT CONNECT ALSO COMMITS $300 MILLION TO MITIGATE THE DISPLACEMENT OF VULNERABLE POPULATIONS IMPACTED BY TRANSIT DEVELOPMENT AND CONSTRUCTION.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: SVP, BUS SVCS & CHIEF OF STAFF

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MODIFIED ACCRUAL ADJ FOR DEFERRED INFLOWS 64,000.
MODIFIED ACCRUAL ADJ FOR FURNITURE AND FIXTURES 597,597. MODIFIED ACCRUAL ADJ FOR DEFERRED INFLOWS 64,000. MODIFIED ACCRUAL ADJ FOR PREPAID LEASE PAYMENTS -6,548. LEASE EXPENSE -21,222.

HR DIRECTOR REVIEWS AND RECOMMENDS ADEQUATE COMPENSATION BASED ON CURRENT SALARY STRUCTURE AND GRADES ESTABLISHED BY ATP'S COMPENSATION PROGRAM AS WELL AS COMPARATIVE DATA. EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS NEGOTIATED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE COMPENSATION OF ALL OTHER STAFF, INCLUDING OFFICERS WHO ARE EMPLOYEES, IS REVIEWED BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE BASED ON RECOMMENDATION BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.
ATP MADE A REASONABLE EFFORT TO OBTAIN COMPENSATION/BENEFIT DETAILS FROM THE RELATED ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BYLAWS OF ATP, AS APPROVED BY THE CITY AND CAP METRO, ESTABLISHED A FIVE-MEMBER BOARD JOINTLY APPOINTED BY MEMBERS OF THE CITY COUNCIL AND THE CAP METRO BOARD. THE AUSTIN CITY COUNCIL AND THE CAP METRO BOARD EACH APPOINT ONE REPRESENTATIVE, AND THE REMAINING THREE MEMBERS WILL BE COMMUNITY EXPERTS IN THE FIELDS OF FINANCE, ENGINEERING AND CONSTRUCTION, AND COMMUNITY PLANNING OR SUSTAINABILITY, APPOINTED JOINTLY BY THE CITY COUNCIL AND THE CAP METRO BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY ATP FINANCE, COMMUNICATIONS, AND LEGAL DEPARTMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER WILL COMPLETE AND RETURN TO ATP'S GENERAL COUNSEL A STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL INTERESTS AND AFFILIATIONS. A VENDOR DOING BUSINESS WITH ATP OR SEEKING TO DO BUSINESS WITH ATP IS REQUIRED TO FILE A COMPLETED QUESTIONNAIRE (FORM CIQ) DISCLOSING THE VENDOR'S AFFILIATIONS OR BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP WITH ANY BOARD MEMBER OR LOCAL GOVERNMENT OFFICER OR THEIR FAMILY MEMBER. INTERNAL AUDITOR AUDITS COMPLIANCE WITH ATP POLICIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HR DIRECTOR REVIEWS AND RECOMMENDS ADEQUATE COMPENSATION BASED ON CURRENT SALARY STRUCTURE AND GRADES ESTABLISHED BY ATP'S COMPENSATION PROGRAM AS WELL AS COMPARATIVE DATA. EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS NEGOTIATED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON ATP'S WEBSITE.
MODIFIED ACCRUAL ADJ FOR FURNITURE AND FIXTURES -597,597. MODIFIED ACCRUAL ADJ FOR DEFERRED INFLOWS -64,000. MODIFIED ACCRUAL ADJ FOR PREPAID LEASE PAYMENTS -6,548.
ATP'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELCTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED.

ATP UTILIZED CAP METRO SERVICES AND EMPLOYEES FOR CERTAIN FUNCTIONS. ATP REIMBURSED CAP METRO FOR THESE INCURRED COSTS. ATP MADE A REASONABLE EFFORT TO OBTAIN COMPENSATION/BENEFIT DETAILS FROM THE RELATED ORGANIZATIONS.
